title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 May 2015 - XWiki

11:45 <Pbas> Hello, my local xwiki 6.4.3 try to connect on http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jstree/3.0.8/jstree.min.js, is it normal (I don't remeber if is is my application).  Perhaps this problem coming from https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-tree/xwiki-platform-tree-webjar/src/main/resources/require-config.js field? Thxs  
11:47 <Pbas> s/field/file

17:07 <OSIMasson> has quit  
17:10 <vmassol> mflorea: hi, what's the ETA for the 7.1M1 release?  
17:12 <mflorea> I'm waiting for the build to finish (all tests should pass this time). gdelhumeau needs to decide what to do with http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11983  
17:12 <vmassol> so tomorrow?  
17:13 <mflorea> yes, I'll try to do the maven release today, but I don't think I'll finish the paper work  
17:14 <vmassol> ok  
17:14 <vmassol> thanks  
17:14 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: closed  
17:14 <mflorea> thanks, I'll start the release after the ci build is done  
17:16 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki

19:16 <Trefex> is xWiki supported on CentOS?  
19:17 <Trefex> or what is the preferred OS?  
19:17 <Trefex> i mean where are the best packages  
19:17 <cjd> should be fine, most of the deployments are on Debian  
19:19 <cjd> centos and debian are not that different, if you were asking about FreeBSD, that might be a different story ;)  
19:20 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
19:22 <Trefex> but there are no yum packages?  
19:22 <Trefex> eg to do easy yum install xwiki cjd  
19:26 <cjd> don't think do, just for debian
